summary: Bug fix verification for Photos tab in Claim Details page - ALL 6 FEATURES VERIFIED WORKING. Photos now appear correctly in claim details, modal viewer works, download functionality works with auth token, and empty state displays properly.

issues: Console warnings about missing DialogTitle and Description for accessibility - minor a11y issue

critical_code_review_comments: Photo grid uses data-testid attributes for each photo element
Download link correctly includes auth token via getToken() helper
Empty state shows 'No photos captured yet' with Start Inspection button
Backend inspection_photos.py supports ?token= query param for img src tags
context_for_next_testing_agent: Photos feature fully working. Test claim with 6 photos: 34fb0abd-ca29-4840-8f3c-250a8f0f3f62. Claim without photos: 23a69760-7850-47f0-833b-2b65af3f5188. WebSocket notifications show connection errors but don't affect functionality.

Feature 1 - Photos tab with camera icon.details: Photos tab shows 'Photos (6)' with camera icon for claim with photos, 'Photos (0)' for claims without

Feature 2 - Photos load and display in g.details: 6 photos displayed in responsive 2x3/3x2/4x2 grid with hover effects and room/category overlay

Feature 3 - Photo modal opens on click.details: Modal shows full image with 'Inspection Photo' title, close button works

Feature 4 - Photo download button works.details: Download link includes auth token (?token=) and proper filename (photo-{id}.jpg)

Feature 5 - Empty state shows 'No photos.details: Empty state shows camera icon, 'No photos captured yet' message, and helper text

Feature 6 - Start Inspection button navi.details: Button in empty state and Quick Actions both navigate to /inspections page

GET /api/inspections/claim/{claim_id}/ph.details: Returns {total: 6, photos: [...], by_room: {}, before_after_pairs: [], rooms: []} for test claim

GET /api/inspections/photos/{photo_id}/i.details: Returns image/jpeg with 200 status when valid token provided

Empty claim photos.details: Returns {total: 0, photos: []} for claims without photos
